products.title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro (256GB, Titanium Gray, A17 Pro Chip)
products.description: Apple’s latest flagship with the A17 Bionic chip, titanium design, and advanced triple-camera system. Experience outstanding performance and all-day battery life.

products.title: JBL Flip 6 Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Waterproof, Deep Bass, Black)
products.description: Compact Bluetooth speaker delivering rich, punchy bass and clear audio. Waterproof and portable — perfect for parties or outdoor adventures.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 (128GB, Phantom Black, 5G Android Smartphone)
products.description: Premium Android smartphone featuring a stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and pro-grade camera system. Built for smooth multitasking and 5G speed.

products.title: Bose QuietComfort 45 Wireless Headphones (Noise Cancelling, Black)
products.description: Experience deep, clear sound and world-class noise cancellation in a lightweight, comfortable design. Perfect for long listening sessions or work focus.

products.title: LG OLED 55-Inch 4K Smart TV (OLED55C3PUA, Dolby Vision, AI ThinQ)
products.description: Experience lifelike colors and infinite contrast with LG’s 4K OLED display. Perfect for cinema lovers seeking exceptional picture quality and sleek design.

products.title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones (Noise Cancelling, Silver)
products.description: Industry-leading noise-cancelling headphones with superb sound quality and 30-hour battery life. Ideal for music lovers and frequent travelers.

products.title: HP Pavilion 15 Laptop (Intel Core i5 13th Gen, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD)
products.description: Reliable everyday laptop featuring Intel Core i5 and fast SSD storage. Ideal for students and professionals needing smooth performance.

products.title: Dell XPS 13 Laptop (Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, InfinityEdge)
products.description: Ultraportable laptop with an edge-to-edge InfinityEdge display and Intel Core i7 processor. Designed for professionals who value style and performance.

products.title: Sony 50-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV (KD-50X85K, Google TV, HDR)
products.description: Stunning 4K UHD display with HDR and smart TV features for seamless streaming. Enjoy vibrant colors and lifelike contrast in every frame.

products.title: Sony PlayStation 5 Console (Disc Edition, 825GB SSD, DualSense Controller)
products.description: Next-generation gaming console with ultra-fast SSD, immersive 4K graphics, and DualSense controller. Redefine your gaming experience with lightning speed.

products.title: Microsoft Xbox Series X (1TB SSD, 4K Gaming Console, Wireless Controller)
products.description: Microsoft’s most powerful console with true 4K gaming and fast load times. Play thousands of games from four generations of Xbox with rich graphics.

products.title: Samsung 65-Inch QLED 4K Smart TV (QN65Q80C, Quantum HDR, Alexa Built-in)
products.description: Vibrant 4K QLED display with quantum dots for brilliant colors and clarity. Enjoy cinematic visuals with HDR10+ and immersive surround sound.

products.title: Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner (High Torque Cleaner Head, Blue)
products.description: Cordless vacuum with intelligent suction power and advanced filtration system. Designed for deep cleaning carpets and hard floors effortlessly.

products.title: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker (6 Quart, Stainless Steel)
products.description: 7-in-1 electric pressure cooker that saves time and space. Cook rice, soups, meats, and more — perfect for quick and healthy meals.

products.title: Google Pixel 8 (128GB, Obsidian, Tensor G3 Chip, 50MP Camera)
products.description: Flagship Android phone with AI-powered camera and Google Tensor G3 chip. Capture stunning photos in any light and enjoy smooth performance.

products.title: Asus ROG Strix G17 Gaming Laptop (Ryzen 9, RTX 4070, 1TB SSD, 17.3” 240Hz)
products.description: High-performance gaming laptop with NVIDIA RTX graphics and fast refresh rate display. Built for gamers who demand ultimate speed and cooling.

products.title: Nintendo Switch OLED Model (Neon Red/Blue Joy-Con, 7” Display)
products.description: Play anywhere with this hybrid console that transitions from handheld to TV mode. Enjoy fun multiplayer gaming with family and friends.

products.title: Samsung 700L Double Door Refrigerator (Digital Inverter, Silver Finish)
products.description: Modern double-door refrigerator with digital inverter technology for energy efficiency and consistent cooling performance. Sleek and spacious design.

products.title: LG Soundbar SN6Y (3.1 Channel, 420W, Wireless Subwoofer, DTS Virtual:X)
products.description: Enhance your home entertainment with crystal-clear sound and deep bass. Wireless subwoofer and Bluetooth connectivity included.

products.title: Apple MacBook Pro 16-Inch (M2 Pro Chip, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, Space Gray)
products.description: Powerful laptop for creators and developers, featuring the Apple M2 Pro chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and all-day battery life. Perfect for productivity and design work.
